description: This source file is a header file defining the interface for PKI entity management within an ASN.1-related component. It declares functions for creating PKI entities and optional certificate-based creation, along with licensing and authorship information.

methods.name: AnscCreateAdvancedPKIEntity
methods.description: Creates a PKI entity handle responsible for key generation, PKCS10 request, and self-signed certificate creation.

methods.name: AnscCreateAdvancedPKIEntityWithCert
methods.description: Creates a PKI entity handle initialized with an existing certificate and private key.
